text: Skor is a chocolate bar made by The Hershey Company. It is a bar covered with milk chocolate and has butter toffee in the center of it. Skor was first launched in 1981 in the United States and 1983 in Canada under the name, Rutnam. One skor bar has 200 calories. ==References== ==Other websites== *Skor at thehersheycompany.com Category:Chocolate bars Category:The Hershey Company
title: Skor
